# lakefs_tag (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "lakefs_tag" "release" {
  repository = lakefs_repository.example.id
  id         = "v1.0.0"
  ref        = "main"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The tag name
- `ref` (String) The commit reference to tag

### Optional

- `force` (Boolean)
- `repository` (String)
- `tag` (String)

### Read-Only

- `commit_id` (String)
